summary: “the conflict between the Starks and the Lannister, it was you [Littlefinger] who started it” This line always sounded strange...
body:
“the conflict between the Starks and the Lannister, it was you [Littlefinger] who started it”

This line always sounded strange to me, as it sort of implies that both families were manipulated into becoming ennemies (which is sort of true, I guess). Do you guys think that it could be foreshadowing of a possible Lannister/Stark coalition? That doesn’t seem very much possible with Cersei in the picture. Or maybe it foreshadows the peace that could exist between the two families by the end of GoT?

tags: so i'm not sure braids twisted into a bun is the right way of putting this
but you get what i mean
summary: It seems Sansa has a new hairstyle. And some are sure it's a lite copy of D*ny hair.  lol
question: It seems Sansa has a new hairstyle. And some are sure it's a lite copy of D*ny hair.  lol
answer:
I don’t know about some. But I do know plenty of Jonsas took one look at that hair and said: the Lyanna hair!

Which I’m not entirely sure I agree with, tbh. 

They’re not that similar from the side. Sansa’s hair is pulled back slick, and the braids start from the crown of her head, which is not the case with Lyanna. But perhaps the actual bun is similar? It’s hard to tell when we can’t get a good look from the back.

Either way, I absolutely do not think she’s copying D/ny’s hair. Lots of characters have had braids twisted into a bun. Catelyn, Cersei, Lyanna, Sansa etc. D/ny is not alone in this.

I’d say it’s more likely a Northern hairstyle than Sansa copying the conqueror.

I’d say it’s more likely a Northern hairstyle than Sansa copying the conqueror.

summary: Re: Sansa Stark is the Key  What other characters would you say have this kind of influence in the “game of thrones”, the...
question: Re: Sansa Stark is the Key  What other characters would you say have this kind of influence in the “game of thrones”, the political game for the iron throne? Characters similar to Sansa who most characters, or they themselves, would brush aside and think of as unimportant or powerless. Because Sansa did not really plan for her actions to have such a large impact—but they did. What other characters do you think are similar to her in this way?
answer:
That’s a very good question, it’s obvious that many characters influenced the game but they did it consciously, unlike Sansa (she was surviving and learning, now she plays the game)

I can’t think of another character besides Ned and Sansa that have this impact on the game without them playing ( I mean, maybe Lyanna?)

reblog.comment:
That’s a very good question, it’s obvious that many characters influenced the game but they did it consciously, unlike Sansa (she was surviving and learning, now she plays the game)

I can’t think of another character besides Ned and Sansa that have this impact on the game without them playing ( I mean, maybe Lyanna?)

trail.content:
That’s a very good question, it’s obvious that many characters influenced the game but they did it consciously, unlike Sansa (she was surviving and learning, now she plays the game)

I can’t think of another character besides Ned and Sansa that have this impact on the game without them playing ( I mean, maybe Lyanna?)

by gaytriangle

Margaery, a well renowned WBI agent, is on the trail of Joffrey Baratheon, whom she believes is behind a string of disappearances in Kings Landing. On the way, she makes tentative friends with a swan, and then things change entirely.

question: what about arya?
answer:
LOVE HER!

Though I do see more Sansa hate, so I tend to be more defensive of Sansa than Arya. Generally, Arya is a more popular character. 

I’m literally the biggest House Stark stan. I love them all. Sansa, Arya, Jon, and Robb are my faves though if I have to narrow it down.

I’m a House Stark and Dany stan.

summary: What is your perfect end for show Sansa in romantic way? I'm so afraid they'll make of her a consolation prize for Jonny boy...
question: What is your perfect end for show Sansa in romantic way? I'm so afraid they'll make of her a consolation prize for Jonny boy after his epic love's death. From one side I don't want her to be alone in the end. But from the other.. I think D&D will def match her with someone.. It's really better alone than with hound, tyrion, jon, or gendry/robin for fuck's sake. And it's too late for a new male character.. (cough Harry cough) I'm afraid.
answer: I honestly can’t say. I don’t want her alone but I don’t want her with anyone either. The consolation prize angle is the one I dread the most. I also hope if they introduce a new guy, they least let us know he’s decent so I don’t have to worry about her

reblog.comment: I honestly can’t say. I don’t want her alone but I don’t want her with anyone either. The consolation prize angle is the one I dread the most. I also hope if they introduce a new guy, they least let us know he’s decent so I don’t have to worry about her

summary:
Imagine: Playing in
the snow with Sansa Stark. A/N: I swear I’m not in love with Sansa Stark... *cries*        You let out...
caption:
Imagine: Playing in the snow with Sansa Stark.

A/N: I swear I’m not in love with Sansa Stark… *cries*

      You let out a laugh, spinning around as the gentle snowflakes fell onto your face.

      Your best friend, Sansa, approaches you with a smile on her face, “Having fun?”

      You blush, not expecting her to see you, “Yes, it’s so beautiful here!”

      “It doesn’t snow where you’re from, does it?”

      You shake your head, “No, this is the first time I’ve ever seen the snow. I love it!”

      The two of you fall into silence, enjoying both the weather and each others’ company. Sansa catches you by surprise when she throws a handful of snow at you, bursting into laughter at your scream.

      “You shouldn’t have done that,” You threaten, teasingly.

      “Oh? What are you going to do about it?”    

      You repeat her actions, throwing snow in her face. This goes on until your footprints are scattered all across the garden and you’re both covered in snow. You feel cold and your stomachs ache from laughing, so you finally call a truce and she approaches you.

      She simply stares at you for a moment before gently brushing some snow out of your hair. Suddenly, she leans in and presses her lips to yours, the action stuns you and she quickly pulls away, “I’m so sorry Y/N, I don-”

      “Don’t apologize Sansa, I liked it, I was just taken aback, that’s all.”  

      “So you wouldn’t mind if I did it again?”

      “I would mind if you didn’t.”

      She smiles at your words before leaning in for another kiss.

      “I’ve been waiting a long time for you to do that,” You whisper breathlessly as she pulls away.

      “So have I.”

End.

To be added or taken off a tag list, feel free to send me a message/ask.

Forever Tags: @nekodemon73 @2toastersbang@beahippie23 @addie-baby @hells-helvig@roseslovedreams @sebastianstanslefteyebrow@pinktrouble@killthe-illusionarydreams @all-by-myself98 @jaiboomer11  @m-a-t-91 @mimikyu-of-death@angels-and-things  @infinte-exist-ence@thisismysecrethappyplace @fandomnerdsarecool@bees-love-books

Game of Thrones: @disneyprincessbuffyannesummers

Forever Tags: @nekodemon73 @2toastersbang@beahippie23 @addie-baby @hells-helvig@roseslovedreams @sebastianstanslefteyebrow@pinktrouble@killthe-illusionarydreams @all-by-myself98 @jaiboomer11  @m-a-t-91 @mimikyu-of-death@angels-and-things  @infinte-exist-ence@thisismysecrethappyplace @fandomnerdsarecool@bees-love-books

Game of Thrones: @disneyprincessbuffyannesummers
trail.content:
Imagine: Playing in the snow with Sansa Stark.

A/N: I swear I’m not in love with Sansa Stark… *cries*

      You let out a laugh, spinning around as the gentle snowflakes fell onto your face.

      Your best friend, Sansa, approaches you with a smile on her face, “Having fun?”

      You blush, not expecting her to see you, “Yes, it’s so beautiful here!”

      “It doesn’t snow where you’re from, does it?”

      You shake your head, “No, this is the first time I’ve ever seen the snow. I love it!”

      The two of you fall into silence, enjoying both the weather and each others’ company. Sansa catches you by surprise when she throws a handful of snow at you, bursting into laughter at your scream.

      “You shouldn’t have done that,” You threaten, teasingly.

      “Oh? What are you going to do about it?”    

      You repeat her actions, throwing snow in her face. This goes on until your footprints are scattered all across the garden and you’re both covered in snow. You feel cold and your stomachs ache from laughing, so you finally call a truce and she approaches you.

      She simply stares at you for a moment before gently brushing some snow out of your hair. Suddenly, she leans in and presses her lips to yours, the action stuns you and she quickly pulls away, “I’m so sorry Y/N, I don-”

      “Don’t apologize Sansa, I liked it, I was just taken aback, that’s all.”  

      “So you wouldn’t mind if I did it again?”

      “I would mind if you didn’t.”

      She smiles at your words before leaning in for another kiss.

      “I’ve been waiting a long time for you to do that,” You whisper breathlessly as she pulls away.

      “So have I.”

End.

A/N: I swear I’m not in love with Sansa Stark… *cries*

      You let out a laugh, spinning around as the gentle snowflakes fell onto your face.

      Your best friend, Sansa, approaches you with a smile on her face, “Having fun?”

summary: I don’t think Sansa had it in her to kill anyone at the beginning of the series for sure. But all of these years that she’s...
caption:
I don’t think Sansa had it in her to kill anyone at the beginning of the series for sure. But all of these years that she’s endured suffering from all of these people who have held captive in one way or other. This is her revenge on all of them. And it’s the most satisfying thing she’s ever done

- Sophie Turner
